note.p: Career: Groom of the Bedchamber to the Duke of Gloucester (1698); Clerk of the Council in extraordinary (1701); English envoy to Copenhagen (1702-1706); MP for Cricklade (1708-1710); Commissioner for Excise (1710-death); Clerk of the Council in Ordinary (1715-death)
Notes: There is doubt as to the identity of this fellow as he does not appear on the PL at all.
